ComicInfo.Summary:
*Overview* Beneath the Veil - Intergalactic explorers come across a an unknown alien race, but they don't seem to be peaceful. Luckily the mysterious spacefarer known as Rahn Arkon is here to help. Pandora - A mugger gets a nasty surprise when he steals a woman's purse. The Further Adventures of Jimmy & Gyro the Cosmic Crows - The crows accidentally crash into a cornfield. The Mothman - A boy tells fellow campers the terrifying tale of the Mothman. Clones - A man is unable to escape his pursuers. Alien Encounter - A dolphin encounters the mysterious otherworlders known as "humans."
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/scary-tales-37-beneath-the-veil-pandora-the-furthe/4000-244457/
